_header: That thine brother in heaven is master and king
Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, thanksgivings to; Christ, love toward; advice, spiritual
_description: Verses on four things to hope for in preparing the ‘cushion’ of hope to receive Christ, in a Latin sermon, Qui custos domini sui gloriabitur, by Friar Nicholas Philip — two couplets

BodLatTheD1.Transcription:
Þat þin broþer in heuen is maister & kyngÞi
                    sustere is maister of all þingHe þat schal deme þe at
                    þe domeHe is þi felaw & þin grome
BodLatTheD1.Editions:
Fletcher,  Alan J. 
             “The Sermon Booklets of Friar Nicholas Philip.” 
             Medium Ævum
         55 (1986): 188-202: 196.
